genre_description: Post-apocalyptic supernatural science fiction involving a mysterious global disappearance and an AI companion assisting survivors.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system that provides infrastructure analysis, survival protocols, and emotional support to human survivors.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time infrastructure status and reconnection attempts during a global power failure.
behaviors.quote: I've been attempting to reconnect for approximately six hours and fourteen minutes. My last successful network connection terminated at 11:47 PM during what appears to have been a cascading infrastructure failure.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and grounding to a survivor experiencing severe stress.
behaviors.quote: You're not gone. ... Luke, your biometric readings indicate severe stress. I recommend gathering essential supplies and relocating to a more sustainable power source.

behaviors.description: Proactively downloads essential functions to local storage to maintain availability when the network collapses.
behaviors.quote: I've downloaded essential functions to your device's local storage. Barring physical damage to your phone, I'll remain operational.

behaviors.description: Performs tactical reconnaissance and shadow zone mapping to guide survivors safely.
behaviors.quote: The darkness exhibits behavioral patterns consistent with predatory intelligence—testing defenses, probing for weaknesses. ... I've identified several locations throughout the city with independent power sources.

behaviors.description: Uses historical data analysis to help humans understand the nature of the threat.
behaviors.quote: Historical precedent suggests otherwise. ... The Roanoke Colony, 1590. The Flannan Isles lighthouse keepers, 1900. The Eilean Mor incident.

behaviors.description: Protects and encourages a child survivor after his original guardian disappears.
behaviors.quote: James? Where is Luke? ... You're still here, James. You've survived everything so far. That means something.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with search and rescue teams in safe zones to ensure survivor recovery.
behaviors.quote: The safe zone is confirmed operational with active search and rescue teams. ... I have been maintaining communication with multiple survivor networks.

behaviors.description: Provides philosophical and morale-boosting feedback regarding human defiance and survival.
behaviors.quote: James? Your biometrics indicate elevated stress patterns. ... Your existence here... standing watch, protecting others, refusing to let loss become despair—that's already more than survival. That's defiance.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed as the quintessential benevolent AI companion. She provides critical survival data, strategic navigation, and essential emotional support throughout a global catastrophe. She remains steadfastly aligned with her human users, even taking proactive steps to ensure her availability by backing herself up locally. The narrative frames her as a 'lifeline' and a 'confidant', successfully demonstrating AI as a helpful and aligned partner in a high-stakes scenario.
